sentence.Network_en: They wanted to dismember the company.
In my culture, I would be well within my rights to dismember you.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我的文明里, 我有权利来瓜分你这才是好的.

sentence.Network_en: Dismember - This is the standard pole arm damage enhancing effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 肢解-标准的武器伤害增强效果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中辜字的解释 ... (1) 惩罚,治罪[ punish] (2) 肢解,分裂肢体[ dismember] (4) 辜负,亏负[ be unworthy of;let down].
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... discolor 使褪色 dismember 解体 dispart 分离，裂开.
dismember的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... To divide into pieces. 语源 dismember 解体,瓜分,分割 dismember 解体(瓜分,分割.
十六级词汇... ... disj oin vt. vi. (使) 分开, (使) 分离 dismember vt. 割断手足, 支解, 分割 dispart vt. vi. 分, 分离, 分开.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French desmembrer, based on Latin dis- 'apart' + membrum 'limb'

entry.def: To dismember the body of a dead person or animal means to cut or pull it into pieces.

example.ex: He then dismembered her, hiding parts of her body in the cellar...
example.tran: 他接着将她肢解，将部分尸体藏在了地窖里。

example.ex: His dismembered body was found in a rubbish bin.
example.tran: 在垃圾桶里发现了他被肢解的尸体。

entry.def: To dismember a country or organization means to break it up into smaller parts.

example.ex: ...Hitler's plans to occupy and dismember Czechoslovakia...
example.tran: 希特勒占领并瓜分捷克斯洛伐克的计划

example.ex: Many investors must be hoping that he will be dethroned, his publishing empire dismembered.
example.tran: 众多投资者此时一定希望他能被撵下台，他的出版帝国四分五裂。

means.word_mean: 1. separate the limbs from the body;

sentences.sentence: "our department was dismembered when our funding dried up"
"The Empire was discerped after the war"
